name: Dungeon Jumper (Dylan AuBuchon)
description:
Welcome to my first prototype game called, Dungeon Jumper. 

You'll be able to explore a short little dungeon with a mysterious past while also finding the exit to the outside world where a jumping puzzle to an easter egg awaits you.

The outside world is fully open and you're able to explore to your heart's content!!!

Thank you so much for checking out Dungeon Jumper!!!
